description: Model Name: P2725H, Color: Black, Display: 68.58 cm (27 inch) LED Display, Panel Type: IPS Panel, Screen Resolution Type: Full HD, Sales Package: 1 Monitor, Stand Riser, Stand Base, Quick Setup Guide, Safety, Environmental and Regulatory Information, Factory Calibration Report, Power Cable, DisplayPort Cable (1.8 m), USB Type-C to USB Type-C Gen 2 Cable (1 m), USB Type-A to USB Type-C Gen 2 Cable (1 m), Screen Form Factor: Flat.
